    public interface IFaceRecognition
    Face recognition
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • getMaxAuthenticationScore

        float getMaxAuthenticationScore()
        Returns:
        Maximum score that may be achieved by comparing two faces

      • getAuthenticationThreshold

        float getAuthenticationThreshold()
        Returns:
        Similarity score threshold beyond which two faces are considered similar enough to be of the same person.
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        compareSubjectFacesToFaces(IRecognizable[], RecognizableFace[])

      • setAuthenticationThreshold

        void setAuthenticationThreshold(float threshold)
        Set authentication score threshold.
        Parameters:
        threshold - Similarity score threshold
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        getAuthenticationThreshold()

      • compareSubjectFacesToFaces

        float compareSubjectFacesToFaces(IRecognizable[] subjectFaces,
                                 RecognizableFace[] faces)
                          throws VerIDCoreException
        Compare a face or a multi-face subject to an array of faces.
        Parameters:
        subjectFaces - The subject faces to compare to the other faces
        faces - Faces to compare to the subject faces
        Returns:
        Similarity score
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the comparison fails
        VerIDCoreException
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • createRecognizableFacesFromFaces

        RecognizableFace[] createRecognizableFacesFromFaces(Face[] faces,
                                                    VerIDImage image)
                                             throws VerIDCoreException
        Create faces that can be used for face recognition from faces.
        Parameters:
        faces - Faces to use as source
        image - Image in which the faces were detected
        Returns:
        Array of faces that can be used for face recognition
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the creation fails
        VerIDCoreException
        Since:
        1.0.0
